name: Notification of Appointment Modification
description: Notification sent when an existing appointment has been modified in the scheduling system
businessPurpose: Notify auxiliary applications that an existing appointment has been modified to maintain schedule synchronization
timing: Sent immediately after an appointment modification is confirmed in the scheduling system
realWorldScenarios: Appointment time changed due to provider running late
Duration extended for complex procedure requirements
Location changed from clinic to telehealth due to weather
Provider substitution due to emergency coverage needs
Additional resources added for procedure complexity
Patient type changed from new to established after record review

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - modification accuracy critical for preventing scheduling conflicts and patient confusion
